CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Contact_Information__c ), "Email: "& Email__c &BR()& "Telephone: "& Telephone__c &BR()& "Address: "& Address__c &BR()& "State: "& State__c &BR()& "Zip: "& ZIP__c &BR()& "Country: "& Country__c , Contact_Information__c)
CustomField.label: Contact Information for email
